page.description: Called when a batch of updates is about to be processed for a database. This event is useful for displaying a progress/cancel dialog.
page.prototype: DatabaseBegin(Context as P, Action as C, TablesExpected as N)

argument.name: Context
argument.description: The object on which the function is called (generally a [DatabaseSnapshot object])

argument.name: Action
argument.description: The action being performed. Will be one of the following values: *[Load]*, *[Store]*, *[LoadDBF]*, or *[StoreDBF]*.

argument.name: TablesExpected
argument.description: The number of tables to be updated.

page.example: FUNCTION DatabaseBegin(Context as P, Action as C, TablesExpected as N) Statusbar.Set_Text("Database " + Action + " beginning. " + TablesExpected + " tables expected.") END FUNCTION
